channel.title: How do i creat shops and shop prices
channel.description: Hi I know how to place NPC's into my server but im haveing problems creating shops, putting items in shops and making shop prices if you could explain to me the files i do this in and what to do that would be awsome thankyou. im also having a hard time getting the NPC i want to have that shop so say i want a shop keeper to sell party hats how do i do that? thx

item.title: How do i creat shops and shop prices
item.dc:creator: @zrickz zrickz
item.description:
@zrickz wrote:

k thx for taking your time to help me.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i creat shops and shop prices

item.title: How do i creat shops and shop prices
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

the part that has // is just a note to remember which is which.
in your shops.cfg you have a line that says

shop = 14

or whatever number you assigned to it, put that number in the WanneShop slot

Read full topic
item.source: How do i creat shops and shop prices

item.title: How do i creat shops and shop prices
item.dc:creator: @zrickz zrickz
item.description:
@zrickz wrote:

ok and all i have to change is the NPC id and the name so say i would change //herb supplies to //skillcape shop?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i creat shops and shop prices

item.title: How do i creat shops and shop prices
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

go in your client.java and search for case 155:

add a line that looks like this

else if (NPCID == 587) { //herblore supplies PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 14; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i creat shops and shop prices
